CustomField.formula: IF( Contract_Finder_Notice_Id__c <>"", HYPERLINK("https://www.contractsfinder.service.gov.uk/Notice/"& Contract_Finder_Notice_Id__c , "https://www.contractsfinder.service.gov.uk/Notice/"& Contract_Finder_Notice_Id__c), "Contracts Finder Notice not yet created")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Hyperlink to Contracts Finder Notice. Note that this link only works for published notices. If a Notice is still unpublished (in draft) the link will show a 'Page Not Found' error.
CustomField.label: Contracts Finder Hyperlink
